item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, May 13, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

9. Lock-Free Rust: How to Build a Rollercoaster While It’s on Fire ( points | 5 comments)
10. LibreWolf Browser ( points | no comments)
11. How is Stack memory allocated when using 'push' or 'sub' x86 instructions? ( points | 2 comments)
12. Policy of transience ( points | no comments)
13. A case for intransitive operator precedence (2019) ( points | 2 comments)
14. Why do Saturation and Luminance go all the way to 240, but Hue goes only to 239? And why 239 anyway? ( points | 2 comments)
15. Hyper-Typing ( points | 23 comments)
16. YS — YAML Done Wisely ( points | 21 comments)
17. Migrating to Codeberg ( points | 62 comments)

21. A modern microframework for web development in C ( points | 3 comments)
22. RIP Usenix ATC ( points | 1 comment)
23. Scalable, Resilient Data Orchestration: The Power of Intelligent Systems ( points | no comments)
24. Stop Saying "Responsible Disclosure" ( points | 29 comments)
